question.text: Under hydrolytic conditions, the compounds used for the preparation of linear polymer and for chain termination, respectively, are

options.text: <math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>  and  <math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math>

<math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>  and  <math><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></math>  and  <math><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math>

solution.text: For linear polymer, we need <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></math>  and for termination, we need  <math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mi mathvariant="normal">S</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi></math> .
